name: Santa's Business
description:
Take care of Santa's Business in this top-down bullet hell mayhem! 

Game features:

  • Survive endless waves for as long as you can! (or until your pc can't run the game anymore! 😂)
  • Shoot and avoid different enemies!
  • Upgrade Santa's powers with different collectibles!

Sidenote: This is a spare-time project that I worked on before the Christmas of 2022. The final result was achieved while mostly working during weekends for around a month and a half.

Credits:

  • Music by StickleSticks
  • Sound effects are taken from freesound.org
  • Characters 3D models UNITY ASSET STORE
  • Buildings 3D models UNITY ASSET STORE
  • Trees 3D models UNITY ASSET STORE
